module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings

-- | Statmux rate control settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings</a> smart constructor.
data MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Int -> MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings

-- | Minimum statmux bitrate.
[$sel:minimumBitrate:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'] :: MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Maximum statmux bitrate.
[$sel:maximumBitrate:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'] :: MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | The purpose of the priority is to use a combination of the\nmultiplex
--   rate control algorithm and the QVBR capability of the\nencoder to
--   prioritize the video quality of some channels in a\nmultiplex over
--   others. Channels that have a higher priority will\nget higher video
--   quality at the expense of the video quality of\nother channels in the
--   multiplex with lower priority.
[$sel:priority:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'] :: MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings -> Maybe Int

-- | Create a value of <a>MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:minimumBitrate:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_minimumBitrate</a> - Minimum statmux
--   bitrate.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maximumBitrate:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_maximumBitrate</a> - Maximum statmux
--   bitrate.
--   
--   <a>$sel:priority:MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_priority</a> - The purpose of the
--   priority is to use a combination of the\nmultiplex rate control
--   algorithm and the QVBR capability of the\nencoder to prioritize the
--   video quality of some channels in a\nmultiplex over others. Channels
--   that have a higher priority will\nget higher video quality at the
--   expense of the video quality of\nother channels in the multiplex with
--   lower priority.
newMultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings :: MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings

-- | Minimum statmux bitrate.
multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_minimumBitrate :: Lens' MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Maximum statmux bitrate.
multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_maximumBitrate :: Lens' MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | The purpose of the priority is to use a combination of the\nmultiplex
--   rate control algorithm and the QVBR capability of the\nencoder to
--   prioritize the video quality of some channels in a\nmultiplex over
--   others. Channels that have a higher priority will\nget higher video
--   quality at the expense of the video quality of\nother channels in the
--   multiplex with lower priority.
multiplexStatmuxVideoSettings_priority :: Lens' MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings (Maybe Int)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings.MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary

-- | Placeholder documentation for MultiplexSummary
--

data MultiplexSummary

[$sel:state:MultiplexSummary'] :: MultiplexSummary -> Maybe MultiplexState

-- | A collection of key-value pairs.
[$sel:tags:MultiplexSummary'] :: MultiplexSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Configuration for a multiplex event.
[$sel:multiplexSettings:MultiplexSummary'] :: MultiplexSummary -> Maybe MultiplexSettingsSummary

-- | Create a value of <a>MultiplexSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:availabilityZones:MultiplexSummary'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexSummary_availabilityZones</a> - A list of availability
--   zones for the multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:MultiplexSummary'</a>, <a>multiplexSummary_arn</a> - The
--   unique arn of the multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:MultiplexSummary'</a>, <a>multiplexSummary_id</a> - The
--   unique id of the multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:pipelinesRunningCount:MultiplexSummary'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexSummary_pipelinesRunningCount</a> - The number of
--   currently healthy pipelines.
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:MultiplexSummary'</a>, <a>multiplexSummary_name</a> - The
--   name of the multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:programCount:MultiplexSummary'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexSummary_programCount</a> - The number of programs in the
--   multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:MultiplexSummary'</a>, <a>multiplexSummary_state</a> -
--   The current state of the multiplex.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:MultiplexSummary'</a>, <a>multiplexSummary_tags</a> - A
--   collection of key-value pairs.
--   
--   <a>$sel:multiplexSettings:MultiplexSummary'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexSummary_multiplexSettings</a> - Configuration for a
--   multiplex event.
newMultiplexSummary :: MultiplexSummary

-- | A list of availability zones for the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_availabilityZones :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe [Text])

-- | The unique arn of the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_arn :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The unique id of the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_id :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of currently healthy pipelines.
multiplexSummary_pipelinesRunningCount :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe Int)

-- | The name of the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_name :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The number of programs in the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_programCount :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe Int)

-- | The current state of the multiplex.
multiplexSummary_state :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe MultiplexState)

-- | A collection of key-value pairs.
multiplexSummary_tags :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Configuration for a multiplex event.
multiplexSummary_multiplexSettings :: Lens' MultiplexSummary (Maybe MultiplexSettingsSummary)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexSummary.MultiplexSummary


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexVideoSettings

-- | The video configuration for each program in a multiplex.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMultiplexVideoSettings</a> smart constructor.
data MultiplexVideoSettings
MultiplexVideoSettings' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings -> MultiplexVideoSettings

-- | The constant bitrate configuration for the video encode. When this
--   field is defined, StatmuxSettings must be undefined.
[$sel:constantBitrate:MultiplexVideoSettings'] :: MultiplexVideoSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Statmux rate control settings. When this field is defined,
--   ConstantBitrate must be undefined.
[$sel:statmuxSettings:MultiplexVideoSettings'] :: MultiplexVideoSettings -> Maybe MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings

-- | Create a value of <a>MultiplexVideoSettings</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:constantBitrate:MultiplexVideoSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexVideoSettings_constantBitrate</a> - The constant bitrate
--   configuration for the video encode. When this field is defined,
--   StatmuxSettings must be undefined.
--   
--   <a>$sel:statmuxSettings:MultiplexVideoSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexVideoSettings_statmuxSettings</a> - Statmux rate control
--   settings. When this field is defined, ConstantBitrate must be
--   undefined.
newMultiplexVideoSettings :: MultiplexVideoSettings

-- | The constant bitrate configuration for the video encode. When this
--   field is defined, StatmuxSettings must be undefined.
multiplexVideoSettings_constantBitrate :: Lens' MultiplexVideoSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Statmux rate control settings. When this field is defined,
--   ConstantBitrate must be undefined.
multiplexVideoSettings_statmuxSettings :: Lens' MultiplexVideoSettings (Maybe MultiplexStatmuxVideoSettings)

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings

-- | Network source to transcode. Must be accessible to the Elemental Live
--   node that is running the live event through a network connection.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newNetworkInputSettings</a> smart constructor.
data NetworkInputSettings
NetworkInputSettings' :: Maybe HlsInputSettings -> Maybe NetworkInputServerValidation -> NetworkInputSettings

-- | Specifies HLS input settings when the uri is for a HLS manifest.
[$sel:hlsInputSettings:NetworkInputSettings'] :: NetworkInputSettings -> Maybe HlsInputSettings

-- | Check HTTPS server certificates. When set to checkCryptographyOnly,
--   cryptography in the certificate will be checked, but not the server's
--   name. Certain subdomains (notably S3 buckets that use dots in the
--   bucket name) do not strictly match the corresponding certificate's
--   wildcard pattern and would otherwise cause the event to error. This
--   setting is ignored for protocols that do not use https.
[$sel:serverValidation:NetworkInputSettings'] :: NetworkInputSettings -> Maybe NetworkInputServerValidation

-- | Create a value of <a>NetworkInputSettings</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:hlsInputSettings:NetworkInputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>networkInputSettings_hlsInputSettings</a> - Specifies HLS input
--   settings when the uri is for a HLS manifest.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serverValidation:NetworkInputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>networkInputSettings_serverValidation</a> - Check HTTPS server
--   certificates. When set to checkCryptographyOnly, cryptography in the
--   certificate will be checked, but not the server's name. Certain
--   subdomains (notably S3 buckets that use dots in the bucket name) do
--   not strictly match the corresponding certificate's wildcard pattern
--   and would otherwise cause the event to error. This setting is ignored
--   for protocols that do not use https.
newNetworkInputSettings :: NetworkInputSettings

-- | Specifies HLS input settings when the uri is for a HLS manifest.
networkInputSettings_hlsInputSettings :: Lens' NetworkInputSettings (Maybe HlsInputSettings)

-- | Check HTTPS server certificates. When set to checkCryptographyOnly,
--   cryptography in the certificate will be checked, but not the server's
--   name. Certain subdomains (notably S3 buckets that use dots in the
--   bucket name) do not strictly match the corresponding certificate's
--   wildcard pattern and would otherwise cause the event to error. This
--   setting is ignored for protocols that do not use https.
networkInputSettings_serverValidation :: Lens' NetworkInputSettings (Maybe NetworkInputServerValidation)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.NetworkInputSettings.NetworkInputSettings

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination

-- | Placeholder documentation for OutputDestination
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newOutputDestination</a> smart constructor.
data OutputDestination
OutputDestination' :: Maybe [MediaPackageOutputDestinationSettings] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe MultiplexProgramChannelDestinationSettings -> Maybe [OutputDestinationSettings] -> OutputDestination

-- | Destination settings for a MediaPackage output; one destination for
--   both encoders.
[$sel:mediaPackageSettings:OutputDestination'] :: OutputDestination -> Maybe [MediaPackageOutputDestinationSettings]

-- | User-specified id. This is used in an output group or an output.
[$sel:id:OutputDestination'] :: OutputDestination -> Maybe Text

-- | Destination settings for a Multiplex output; one destination for both
--   encoders.
[$sel:multiplexSettings:OutputDestination'] :: OutputDestination -> Maybe MultiplexProgramChannelDestinationSettings

-- | Destination settings for a standard output; one destination for each
--   redundant encoder.
[$sel:settings:OutputDestination'] :: OutputDestination -> Maybe [OutputDestinationSettings]

-- | Create a value of <a>OutputDestination</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:mediaPackageSettings:OutputDestination'</a>,
--   <a>outputDestination_mediaPackageSettings</a> - Destination settings
--   for a MediaPackage output; one destination for both encoders.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:OutputDestination'</a>, <a>outputDestination_id</a> -
--   User-specified id. This is used in an output group or an output.
--   
--   <a>$sel:multiplexSettings:OutputDestination'</a>,
--   <a>outputDestination_multiplexSettings</a> - Destination settings for
--   a Multiplex output; one destination for both encoders.
--   
--   <a>$sel:settings:OutputDestination'</a>,
--   <a>outputDestination_settings</a> - Destination settings for a
--   standard output; one destination for each redundant encoder.
newOutputDestination :: OutputDestination

-- | Destination settings for a MediaPackage output; one destination for
--   both encoders.
outputDestination_mediaPackageSettings :: Lens' OutputDestination (Maybe [MediaPackageOutputDestinationSettings])

-- | User-specified id. This is used in an output group or an output.
outputDestination_id :: Lens' OutputDestination (Maybe Text)

-- | Destination settings for a Multiplex output; one destination for both
--   encoders.
outputDestination_multiplexSettings :: Lens' OutputDestination (Maybe MultiplexProgramChannelDestinationSettings)

-- | Destination settings for a standard output; one destination for each
--   redundant encoder.
outputDestination_settings :: Lens' OutputDestination (Maybe [OutputDestinationSettings])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.OutputDestination.OutputDestination

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail

-- | Runtime details of a pipeline when a channel is running.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newPipelineDetail</a> smart constructor.
data PipelineDetail
PipelineDetail' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> PipelineDetail

-- | Pipeline ID
[$sel:pipelineId:PipelineDetail'] :: PipelineDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the active input attachment currently being ingested by
--   this pipeline.
[$sel:activeInputAttachmentName:PipelineDetail'] :: PipelineDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the motion graphics activate action that occurred most
--   recently and that resulted in the current graphics URI for this
--   pipeline.
[$sel:activeMotionGraphicsActionName:PipelineDetail'] :: PipelineDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The current URI being used for HTML5 motion graphics for this
--   pipeline.
[$sel:activeMotionGraphicsUri:PipelineDetail'] :: PipelineDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the input switch schedule action that occurred most
--   recently and that resulted in the switch to the current input
--   attachment for this pipeline.
[$sel:activeInputSwitchActionName:PipelineDetail'] :: PipelineDetail -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>PipelineDetail</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:pipelineId:PipelineDetail'</a>,
--   <a>pipelineDetail_pipelineId</a> - Pipeline ID
--   
--   <a>$sel:activeInputAttachmentName:PipelineDetail'</a>,
--   <a>pipelineDetail_activeInputAttachmentName</a> - The name of the
--   active input attachment currently being ingested by this pipeline.
--   
--   <a>$sel:activeMotionGraphicsActionName:PipelineDetail'</a>,
--   <a>pipelineDetail_activeMotionGraphicsActionName</a> - The name of the
--   motion graphics activate action that occurred most recently and that
--   resulted in the current graphics URI for this pipeline.
--   
--   <a>$sel:activeMotionGraphicsUri:PipelineDetail'</a>,
--   <a>pipelineDetail_activeMotionGraphicsUri</a> - The current URI being
--   used for HTML5 motion graphics for this pipeline.
--   
--   <a>$sel:activeInputSwitchActionName:PipelineDetail'</a>,
--   <a>pipelineDetail_activeInputSwitchActionName</a> - The name of the
--   input switch schedule action that occurred most recently and that
--   resulted in the switch to the current input attachment for this
--   pipeline.
newPipelineDetail :: PipelineDetail

-- | Pipeline ID
pipelineDetail_pipelineId :: Lens' PipelineDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the active input attachment currently being ingested by
--   this pipeline.
pipelineDetail_activeInputAttachmentName :: Lens' PipelineDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the motion graphics activate action that occurred most
--   recently and that resulted in the current graphics URI for this
--   pipeline.
pipelineDetail_activeMotionGraphicsActionName :: Lens' PipelineDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The current URI being used for HTML5 motion graphics for this
--   pipeline.
pipelineDetail_activeMotionGraphicsUri :: Lens' PipelineDetail (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the input switch schedule action that occurred most
--   recently and that resulted in the switch to the current input
--   attachment for this pipeline.
pipelineDetail_activeInputSwitchActionName :: Lens' PipelineDetail (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail.PipelineDetail
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail.PipelineDetail
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail.PipelineDetail
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail.PipelineDetail
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PipelineDetail.PipelineDetail

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline

-- | Indicates which pipeline is preferred by the multiplex for program
--   ingest. If set to \"PIPELINE_0\" or \"PIPELINE_1\" and an unhealthy
--   ingest causes the multiplex to switch to the non-preferred pipeline,
--   it will switch back once that ingest is healthy again. If set to
--   \"CURRENTLY_ACTIVE\", it will not switch back to the other pipeline
--   based on it recovering to a healthy state, it will only switch if the
--   active pipeline becomes unhealthy.
newtype PreferredChannelPipeline
PreferredChannelPipeline' :: Text -> PreferredChannelPipeline
[fromPreferredChannelPipeline] :: PreferredChannelPipeline -> Text
pattern PreferredChannelPipeline_CURRENTLY_ACTIVE :: PreferredChannelPipeline
pattern PreferredChannelPipeline_PIPELINE_0 :: PreferredChannelPipeline
pattern PreferredChannelPipeline_PIPELINE_1 :: PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeader Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.Log.ToLog Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.ByteString.ToByteString Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.ToText Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Network.AWS.Data.Text.FromText Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance GHC.Classes.Ord Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.PreferredChannelPipeline.PreferredChannelPipeline


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings

-- | Multiplex Program settings configuration.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMultiplexProgramSettings</a> smart constructor.
data MultiplexProgramSettings
MultiplexProgramSettings' :: Maybe PreferredChannelPipeline -> Maybe MultiplexProgramServiceDescriptor -> Maybe MultiplexVideoSettings -> Natural -> MultiplexProgramSettings

-- | Indicates which pipeline is preferred by the multiplex for program
--   ingest.
[$sel:preferredChannelPipeline:MultiplexProgramSettings'] :: MultiplexProgramSettings -> Maybe PreferredChannelPipeline

-- | Transport stream service descriptor configuration for the Multiplex
--   program.
[$sel:serviceDescriptor:MultiplexProgramSettings'] :: MultiplexProgramSettings -> Maybe MultiplexProgramServiceDescriptor

-- | Program video settings configuration.
[$sel:videoSettings:MultiplexProgramSettings'] :: MultiplexProgramSettings -> Maybe MultiplexVideoSettings

-- | Unique program number.
[$sel:programNumber:MultiplexProgramSettings'] :: MultiplexProgramSettings -> Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>MultiplexProgramSettings</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:preferredChannelPipeline:MultiplexProgramSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgramSettings_preferredChannelPipeline</a> - Indicates
--   which pipeline is preferred by the multiplex for program ingest.
--   
--   <a>$sel:serviceDescriptor:MultiplexProgramSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgramSettings_serviceDescriptor</a> - Transport stream
--   service descriptor configuration for the Multiplex program.
--   
--   <a>$sel:videoSettings:MultiplexProgramSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgramSettings_videoSettings</a> - Program video settings
--   configuration.
--   
--   <a>$sel:programNumber:MultiplexProgramSettings'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgramSettings_programNumber</a> - Unique program number.
newMultiplexProgramSettings :: Natural -> MultiplexProgramSettings

-- | Indicates which pipeline is preferred by the multiplex for program
--   ingest.
multiplexProgramSettings_preferredChannelPipeline :: Lens' MultiplexProgramSettings (Maybe PreferredChannelPipeline)

-- | Transport stream service descriptor configuration for the Multiplex
--   program.
multiplexProgramSettings_serviceDescriptor :: Lens' MultiplexProgramSettings (Maybe MultiplexProgramServiceDescriptor)

-- | Program video settings configuration.
multiplexProgramSettings_videoSettings :: Lens' MultiplexProgramSettings (Maybe MultiplexVideoSettings)

-- | Unique program number.
multiplexProgramSettings_programNumber :: Lens' MultiplexProgramSettings Natural
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgramSettings.MultiplexProgramSettings


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram

-- | The multiplex program object.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newMultiplexProgram</a> smart constructor.
data MultiplexProgram
MultiplexProgram' :: Maybe MultiplexProgramPacketIdentifiersMap -> Maybe MultiplexProgramSettings -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe [MultiplexProgramPipelineDetail] -> MultiplexProgram

-- | The packet identifier map for this multiplex program.
[$sel:packetIdentifiersMap:MultiplexProgram'] :: MultiplexProgram -> Maybe MultiplexProgramPacketIdentifiersMap

-- | The settings for this multiplex program.
[$sel:multiplexProgramSettings:MultiplexProgram'] :: MultiplexProgram -> Maybe MultiplexProgramSettings

-- | The MediaLive channel associated with the program.
[$sel:channelId:MultiplexProgram'] :: MultiplexProgram -> Maybe Text

-- | The name of the multiplex program.
[$sel:programName:MultiplexProgram'] :: MultiplexProgram -> Maybe Text

-- | Contains information about the current sources for the specified
--   program in the specified multiplex. Keep in mind that each multiplex
--   pipeline connects to both pipelines in a given source channel (the
--   channel identified by the program). But only one of those channel
--   pipelines is ever active at one time.
[$sel:pipelineDetails:MultiplexProgram'] :: MultiplexProgram -> Maybe [MultiplexProgramPipelineDetail]

-- | Create a value of <a>MultiplexProgram</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:packetIdentifiersMap:MultiplexProgram'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgram_packetIdentifiersMap</a> - The packet identifier
--   map for this multiplex program.
--   
--   <a>$sel:multiplexProgramSettings:MultiplexProgram'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgram_multiplexProgramSettings</a> - The settings for
--   this multiplex program.
--   
--   <a>$sel:channelId:MultiplexProgram'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgram_channelId</a> - The MediaLive channel associated
--   with the program.
--   
--   <a>$sel:programName:MultiplexProgram'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgram_programName</a> - The name of the multiplex
--   program.
--   
--   <a>$sel:pipelineDetails:MultiplexProgram'</a>,
--   <a>multiplexProgram_pipelineDetails</a> - Contains information about
--   the current sources for the specified program in the specified
--   multiplex. Keep in mind that each multiplex pipeline connects to both
--   pipelines in a given source channel (the channel identified by the
--   program). But only one of those channel pipelines is ever active at
--   one time.
newMultiplexProgram :: MultiplexProgram

-- | The packet identifier map for this multiplex program.
multiplexProgram_packetIdentifiersMap :: Lens' MultiplexProgram (Maybe MultiplexProgramPacketIdentifiersMap)

-- | The settings for this multiplex program.
multiplexProgram_multiplexProgramSettings :: Lens' MultiplexProgram (Maybe MultiplexProgramSettings)

-- | The MediaLive channel associated with the program.
multiplexProgram_channelId :: Lens' MultiplexProgram (Maybe Text)

-- | The name of the multiplex program.
multiplexProgram_programName :: Lens' MultiplexProgram (Maybe Text)

-- | Contains information about the current sources for the specified
--   program in the specified multiplex. Keep in mind that each multiplex
--   pipeline connects to both pipelines in a given source channel (the
--   channel identified by the program). But only one of those channel
--   pipelines is ever active at one time.
multiplexProgram_pipelineDetails :: Lens' MultiplexProgram (Maybe [MultiplexProgramPipelineDetail])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.MultiplexProgram.MultiplexProgram

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings

-- | Archive Output Settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newArchiveOutputSettings</a> smart constructor.
data ArchiveOutputSettings
ArchiveOutputSettings' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ArchiveContainerSettings -> ArchiveOutputSettings

-- | Output file extension. If excluded, this will be auto-selected from
--   the container type.
[$sel:extension:ArchiveOutputSettings'] :: ArchiveOutputSettings -> Maybe Text

-- | String concatenated to the end of the destination filename. Required
--   for multiple outputs of the same type.
[$sel:nameModifier:ArchiveOutputSettings'] :: ArchiveOutputSettings -> Maybe Text

-- | Settings specific to the container type of the file.
[$sel:containerSettings:ArchiveOutputSettings'] :: ArchiveOutputSettings -> ArchiveContainerSettings

-- | Create a value of <a>ArchiveOutputSettings</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:extension:ArchiveOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>archiveOutputSettings_extension</a> - Output file extension. If
--   excluded, this will be auto-selected from the container type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nameModifier:ArchiveOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>archiveOutputSettings_nameModifier</a> - String concatenated to the
--   end of the destination filename. Required for multiple outputs of the
--   same type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:containerSettings:ArchiveOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>archiveOutputSettings_containerSettings</a> - Settings specific to
--   the container type of the file.
newArchiveOutputSettings :: ArchiveContainerSettings -> ArchiveOutputSettings

-- | Output file extension. If excluded, this will be auto-selected from
--   the container type.
archiveOutputSettings_extension :: Lens' ArchiveOutputSettings (Maybe Text)

-- | String concatenated to the end of the destination filename. Required
--   for multiple outputs of the same type.
archiveOutputSettings_nameModifier :: Lens' ArchiveOutputSettings (Maybe Text)

-- | Settings specific to the container type of the file.
archiveOutputSettings_containerSettings :: Lens' ArchiveOutputSettings ArchiveContainerSettings
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ArchiveOutputSettings.ArchiveOutputSettings

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings

-- | Remix Settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRemixSettings</a> smart constructor.
data RemixSettings
RemixSettings' :: Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> [AudioChannelMapping] -> RemixSettings

-- | Number of input channels to be used.
[$sel:channelsIn:RemixSettings'] :: RemixSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Number of output channels to be produced. Valid values: 1, 2, 4, 6, 8
[$sel:channelsOut:RemixSettings'] :: RemixSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Mapping of input channels to output channels, with appropriate gain
--   adjustments.
[$sel:channelMappings:RemixSettings'] :: RemixSettings -> [AudioChannelMapping]

-- | Create a value of <a>RemixSettings</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:channelsIn:RemixSettings'</a>, <a>remixSettings_channelsIn</a>
--   - Number of input channels to be used.
--   
--   <a>$sel:channelsOut:RemixSettings'</a>,
--   <a>remixSettings_channelsOut</a> - Number of output channels to be
--   produced. Valid values: 1, 2, 4, 6, 8
--   
--   <a>$sel:channelMappings:RemixSettings'</a>,
--   <a>remixSettings_channelMappings</a> - Mapping of input channels to
--   output channels, with appropriate gain adjustments.
newRemixSettings :: RemixSettings

-- | Number of input channels to be used.
remixSettings_channelsIn :: Lens' RemixSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Number of output channels to be produced. Valid values: 1, 2, 4, 6, 8
remixSettings_channelsOut :: Lens' RemixSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Mapping of input channels to output channels, with appropriate gain
--   adjustments.
remixSettings_channelMappings :: Lens' RemixSettings [AudioChannelMapping]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RemixSettings.RemixSettings

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution

-- | Resolution based on lines of vertical resolution; SD is less than 720
--   lines, HD is 720 to 1080 lines, FHD is 1080 lines, UHD is greater than
--   1080 lines
newtype ReservationResolution
ReservationResolution' :: Text -> ReservationResolution
[fromReservationResolution] :: ReservationResolution -> Text
pattern ReservationResolution_FHD :: ReservationResolution
pattern ReservationResolution_HD :: ReservationResolution
pattern ReservationResolution_SD :: ReservationResolution
pattern ReservationResolution_UHD :: ReservationResolution
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.ToXML Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Network.AWS.Data.XML.FromXML Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSONKey Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSONKey Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResolution.ReservationResolution

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification

-- | Resource configuration (codec, resolution, bitrate, ...)
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newReservationResourceSpecification</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ReservationResourceSpecification
ReservationResourceSpecification' :: Maybe ReservationMaximumFramerate -> Maybe ReservationVideoQuality -> Maybe ReservationCodec -> Maybe ReservationMaximumBitrate -> Maybe ChannelClass -> Maybe ReservationSpecialFeature -> Maybe ReservationResourceType -> Maybe ReservationResolution -> ReservationResourceSpecification

-- | Maximum framerate, e.g. 'MAX_30_FPS' (Outputs only)
[$sel:maximumFramerate:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationMaximumFramerate

-- | Video quality, e.g. 'STANDARD' (Outputs only)
[$sel:videoQuality:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationVideoQuality

-- | Codec, e.g. 'AVC'
[$sel:codec:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationCodec

-- | Maximum bitrate, e.g. 'MAX_20_MBPS'
[$sel:maximumBitrate:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationMaximumBitrate

-- | Channel class, e.g. 'STANDARD'
[$sel:channelClass:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ChannelClass

-- | Special feature, e.g. 'AUDIO_NORMALIZATION' (Channels only)
[$sel:specialFeature:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationSpecialFeature

-- | Resource type, 'INPUT', 'OUTPUT', 'MULTIPLEX', or 'CHANNEL'
[$sel:resourceType:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationResourceType

-- | Resolution, e.g. 'HD'
[$sel:resolution:ReservationResourceSpecification'] :: ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationResolution

-- | Create a value of <a>ReservationResourceSpecification</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:maximumFramerate:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_maximumFramerate</a> - Maximum
--   framerate, e.g. 'MAX_30_FPS' (Outputs only)
--   
--   <a>$sel:videoQuality:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_videoQuality</a> - Video quality,
--   e.g. 'STANDARD' (Outputs only)
--   
--   <a>$sel:codec:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_codec</a> - Codec, e.g. 'AVC'
--   
--   <a>$sel:maximumBitrate:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_maximumBitrate</a> - Maximum
--   bitrate, e.g. 'MAX_20_MBPS'
--   
--   <a>$sel:channelClass:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_channelClass</a> - Channel class,
--   e.g. 'STANDARD'
--   
--   <a>$sel:specialFeature:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_specialFeature</a> - Special
--   feature, e.g. 'AUDIO_NORMALIZATION' (Channels only)
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_resourceType</a> - Resource type,
--   'INPUT', 'OUTPUT', 'MULTIPLEX', or 'CHANNEL'
--   
--   <a>$sel:resolution:ReservationResourceSpecification'</a>,
--   <a>reservationResourceSpecification_resolution</a> - Resolution, e.g.
--   'HD'
newReservationResourceSpecification :: ReservationResourceSpecification

-- | Maximum framerate, e.g. 'MAX_30_FPS' (Outputs only)
reservationResourceSpecification_maximumFramerate :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationMaximumFramerate)

-- | Video quality, e.g. 'STANDARD' (Outputs only)
reservationResourceSpecification_videoQuality :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationVideoQuality)

-- | Codec, e.g. 'AVC'
reservationResourceSpecification_codec :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationCodec)

-- | Maximum bitrate, e.g. 'MAX_20_MBPS'
reservationResourceSpecification_maximumBitrate :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationMaximumBitrate)

-- | Channel class, e.g. 'STANDARD'
reservationResourceSpecification_channelClass :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ChannelClass)

-- | Special feature, e.g. 'AUDIO_NORMALIZATION' (Channels only)
reservationResourceSpecification_specialFeature :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationSpecialFeature)

-- | Resource type, 'INPUT', 'OUTPUT', 'MULTIPLEX', or 'CHANNEL'
reservationResourceSpecification_resourceType :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationResourceType)

-- | Resolution, e.g. 'HD'
reservationResourceSpecification_resolution :: Lens' ReservationResourceSpecification (Maybe ReservationResolution)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification.ReservationResourceSpecification
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification.ReservationResourceSpecification
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification.ReservationResourceSpecification
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification.ReservationResourceSpecification

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ReservationResourceSpecification.ReservationResourceSpecification


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation

-- | Reserved resources available to use
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newReservation</a> smart constructor.
data Reservation
Reservation' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Int -> Maybe OfferingDurationUnits -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe ReservationState -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Int -> Maybe Double -> Maybe OfferingType -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Reservation

-- | Reservation UTC end date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g.
--   '2019-03-01T00:00:00'
[$sel:end:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Lease duration, e.g. '12'
[$sel:duration:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Int

-- | Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
[$sel:durationUnits:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe OfferingDurationUnits

-- | Unique reservation ARN, e.g.
--   'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:reservation:1234567'
[$sel:arn:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Unique offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
[$sel:offeringId:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
[$sel:currencyCode:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | User specified reservation name
[$sel:name:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Resource configuration details
[$sel:resourceSpecification:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification

-- | Current state of reservation, e.g. 'ACTIVE'
[$sel:state:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe ReservationState

-- | A collection of key-value pairs
[$sel:tags:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Offering description, e.g. 'HD AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and
--   standard VQ in US West (Oregon)'
[$sel:offeringDescription:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
[$sel:fixedPrice:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Double

-- | Number of reserved resources
[$sel:count:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Int

-- | Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
[$sel:usagePrice:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Double

-- | Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
[$sel:offeringType:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe OfferingType

-- | AWS region, e.g. 'us-west-2'
[$sel:region:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Reservation UTC start date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g.
--   '2018-03-01T00:00:00'
[$sel:start:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Unique reservation ID, e.g. '1234567'
[$sel:reservationId:Reservation'] :: Reservation -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Reservation</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:end:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_end</a> - Reservation UTC
--   end date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g. '2019-03-01T00:00:00'
--   
--   <a>$sel:duration:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_duration</a> - Lease
--   duration, e.g. '12'
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationUnits:Reservation'</a>,
--   <a>reservation_durationUnits</a> - Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_arn</a> - Unique
--   reservation ARN, e.g.
--   'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:reservation:1234567'
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringId:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_offeringId</a> -
--   Unique offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
--   
--   <a>$sel:currencyCode:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_currencyCode</a>
--   - Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
--   
--   <a>$sel:name:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_name</a> - User
--   specified reservation name
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceSpecification:Reservation'</a>,
--   <a>reservation_resourceSpecification</a> - Resource configuration
--   details
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_state</a> - Current
--   state of reservation, e.g. 'ACTIVE'
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_tags</a> - A collection
--   of key-value pairs
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringDescription:Reservation'</a>,
--   <a>reservation_offeringDescription</a> - Offering description, e.g.
--   'HD AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and standard VQ in US West
--   (Oregon)'
--   
--   <a>$sel:fixedPrice:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_fixedPrice</a> -
--   One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
--   
--   <a>$sel:count:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_count</a> - Number of
--   reserved resources
--   
--   <a>$sel:usagePrice:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_usagePrice</a> -
--   Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringType:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_offeringType</a>
--   - Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
--   
--   <a>$sel:region:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_region</a> - AWS
--   region, e.g. 'us-west-2'
--   
--   <a>$sel:start:Reservation'</a>, <a>reservation_start</a> - Reservation
--   UTC start date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g. '2018-03-01T00:00:00'
--   
--   <a>$sel:reservationId:Reservation'</a>,
--   <a>reservation_reservationId</a> - Unique reservation ID, e.g.
--   '1234567'
newReservation :: Reservation

-- | Reservation UTC end date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g.
--   '2019-03-01T00:00:00'
reservation_end :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Lease duration, e.g. '12'
reservation_duration :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Int)

-- | Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
reservation_durationUnits :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe OfferingDurationUnits)

-- | Unique reservation ARN, e.g.
--   'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:reservation:1234567'
reservation_arn :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Unique offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
reservation_offeringId :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
reservation_currencyCode :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | User specified reservation name
reservation_name :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Resource configuration details
reservation_resourceSpecification :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification)

-- | Current state of reservation, e.g. 'ACTIVE'
reservation_state :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe ReservationState)

-- | A collection of key-value pairs
reservation_tags :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Offering description, e.g. 'HD AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and
--   standard VQ in US West (Oregon)'
reservation_offeringDescription :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
reservation_fixedPrice :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Double)

-- | Number of reserved resources
reservation_count :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Int)

-- | Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
reservation_usagePrice :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Double)

-- | Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
reservation_offeringType :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe OfferingType)

-- | AWS region, e.g. 'us-west-2'
reservation_region :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Reservation UTC start date and time in ISO-8601 format, e.g.
--   '2018-03-01T00:00:00'
reservation_start :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)

-- | Unique reservation ID, e.g. '1234567'
reservation_reservationId :: Lens' Reservation (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Reservation.Reservation


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering

-- | Reserved resources available for purchase
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newOffering</a> smart constructor.
data Offering
Offering' :: Maybe Int -> Maybe OfferingDurationUnits -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Double -> Maybe Double -> Maybe OfferingType -> Maybe Text -> Offering

-- | Lease duration, e.g. '12'
[$sel:duration:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Int

-- | Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
[$sel:durationUnits:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe OfferingDurationUnits

-- | Unique offering ARN, e.g.
--   'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:offering:87654321'
[$sel:arn:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Text

-- | Unique offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
[$sel:offeringId:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Text

-- | Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
[$sel:currencyCode:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Text

-- | Resource configuration details
[$sel:resourceSpecification:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification

-- | Offering description, e.g. 'HD AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and
--   standard VQ in US West (Oregon)'
[$sel:offeringDescription:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Text

-- | One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
[$sel:fixedPrice:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Double

-- | Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
[$sel:usagePrice:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Double

-- | Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
[$sel:offeringType:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe OfferingType

-- | AWS region, e.g. 'us-west-2'
[$sel:region:Offering'] :: Offering -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Offering</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:duration:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_duration</a> - Lease
--   duration, e.g. '12'
--   
--   <a>$sel:durationUnits:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_durationUnits</a> -
--   Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
--   
--   <a>$sel:arn:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_arn</a> - Unique offering ARN,
--   e.g. 'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:offering:87654321'
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringId:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_offeringId</a> - Unique
--   offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
--   
--   <a>$sel:currencyCode:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_currencyCode</a> -
--   Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceSpecification:Offering'</a>,
--   <a>offering_resourceSpecification</a> - Resource configuration details
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringDescription:Offering'</a>,
--   <a>offering_offeringDescription</a> - Offering description, e.g. 'HD
--   AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and standard VQ in US West (Oregon)'
--   
--   <a>$sel:fixedPrice:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_fixedPrice</a> -
--   One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
--   
--   <a>$sel:usagePrice:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_usagePrice</a> -
--   Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
--   
--   <a>$sel:offeringType:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_offeringType</a> -
--   Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
--   
--   <a>$sel:region:Offering'</a>, <a>offering_region</a> - AWS region,
--   e.g. 'us-west-2'
newOffering :: Offering

-- | Lease duration, e.g. '12'
offering_duration :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Int)

-- | Units for duration, e.g. 'MONTHS'
offering_durationUnits :: Lens' Offering (Maybe OfferingDurationUnits)

-- | Unique offering ARN, e.g.
--   'arn:aws:medialive:us-west-2:123456789012:offering:87654321'
offering_arn :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Text)

-- | Unique offering ID, e.g. '87654321'
offering_offeringId :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Text)

-- | Currency code for usagePrice and fixedPrice in ISO-4217 format, e.g.
--   'USD'
offering_currencyCode :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Text)

-- | Resource configuration details
offering_resourceSpecification :: Lens' Offering (Maybe ReservationResourceSpecification)

-- | Offering description, e.g. 'HD AVC output at 10-20 Mbps, 30 fps, and
--   standard VQ in US West (Oregon)'
offering_offeringDescription :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Text)

-- | One-time charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '0.0' for a
--   NO_UPFRONT offering
offering_fixedPrice :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Double)

-- | Recurring usage charge for each reserved resource, e.g. '157.0'
offering_usagePrice :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Double)

-- | Offering type, e.g. 'NO_UPFRONT'
offering_offeringType :: Lens' Offering (Maybe OfferingType)

-- | AWS region, e.g. 'us-west-2'
offering_region :: Lens' Offering (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.Offering.Offering

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings

-- | Rtmp Group Settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRtmpGroupSettings</a> smart constructor.
data RtmpGroupSettings
RtmpGroupSettings' :: Maybe [RtmpAdMarkers] -> Maybe RtmpCaptionData -> Maybe RtmpCacheFullBehavior -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe AuthenticationScheme -> Maybe InputLossActionForRtmpOut -> Maybe Natural -> RtmpGroupSettings

-- | Choose the ad marker type for this output group. MediaLive will create
--   a message based on the content of each SCTE-35 message, format it for
--   that marker type, and insert it in the datastream.
[$sel:adMarkers:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe [RtmpAdMarkers]

-- | Controls the types of data that passes to onCaptionInfo outputs. If
--   set to 'all' then 608 and 708 carried DTVCC data will be passed. If
--   set to 'field1AndField2608' then DTVCC data will be stripped out, but
--   608 data from both fields will be passed. If set to 'field1608' then
--   only the data carried in 608 from field 1 video will be passed.
[$sel:captionData:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe RtmpCaptionData

-- | Controls behavior when content cache fills up. If remote origin server
--   stalls the RTMP connection and does not accept content fast enough the
--   'Media Cache' will fill up. When the cache reaches the duration
--   specified by cacheLength the cache will stop accepting new content. If
--   set to disconnectImmediately, the RTMP output will force a disconnect.
--   Clear the media cache, and reconnect after restartDelay seconds. If
--   set to waitForServer, the RTMP output will wait up to 5 minutes to
--   allow the origin server to begin accepting data again.
[$sel:cacheFullBehavior:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe RtmpCacheFullBehavior

-- | Cache length, in seconds, is used to calculate buffer size.
[$sel:cacheLength:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Authentication scheme to use when connecting with CDN
[$sel:authenticationScheme:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe AuthenticationScheme

-- | Controls the behavior of this RTMP group if input becomes unavailable.
--   - emitOutput: Emit a slate until input returns. - pauseOutput: Stop
--   transmitting data until input returns. This does not close the
--   underlying RTMP connection.
[$sel:inputLossAction:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe InputLossActionForRtmpOut

-- | If a streaming output fails, number of seconds to wait until a restart
--   is initiated. A value of 0 means never restart.
[$sel:restartDelay:RtmpGroupSettings'] :: RtmpGroupSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>RtmpGroupSettings</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:adMarkers:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_adMarkers</a> - Choose the ad marker type for
--   this output group. MediaLive will create a message based on the
--   content of each SCTE-35 message, format it for that marker type, and
--   insert it in the datastream.
--   
--   <a>$sel:captionData:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_captionData</a> - Controls the types of data that
--   passes to onCaptionInfo outputs. If set to 'all' then 608 and 708
--   carried DTVCC data will be passed. If set to 'field1AndField2608' then
--   DTVCC data will be stripped out, but 608 data from both fields will be
--   passed. If set to 'field1608' then only the data carried in 608 from
--   field 1 video will be passed.
--   
--   <a>$sel:cacheFullBehavior:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_cacheFullBehavior</a> - Controls behavior when
--   content cache fills up. If remote origin server stalls the RTMP
--   connection and does not accept content fast enough the 'Media Cache'
--   will fill up. When the cache reaches the duration specified by
--   cacheLength the cache will stop accepting new content. If set to
--   disconnectImmediately, the RTMP output will force a disconnect. Clear
--   the media cache, and reconnect after restartDelay seconds. If set to
--   waitForServer, the RTMP output will wait up to 5 minutes to allow the
--   origin server to begin accepting data again.
--   
--   <a>$sel:cacheLength:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_cacheLength</a> - Cache length, in seconds, is
--   used to calculate buffer size.
--   
--   <a>$sel:authenticationScheme:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_authenticationScheme</a> - Authentication scheme
--   to use when connecting with CDN
--   
--   <a>$sel:inputLossAction:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_inputLossAction</a> - Controls the behavior of
--   this RTMP group if input becomes unavailable. - emitOutput: Emit a
--   slate until input returns. - pauseOutput: Stop transmitting data until
--   input returns. This does not close the underlying RTMP connection.
--   
--   <a>$sel:restartDelay:RtmpGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpGroupSettings_restartDelay</a> - If a streaming output fails,
--   number of seconds to wait until a restart is initiated. A value of 0
--   means never restart.
newRtmpGroupSettings :: RtmpGroupSettings

-- | Choose the ad marker type for this output group. MediaLive will create
--   a message based on the content of each SCTE-35 message, format it for
--   that marker type, and insert it in the datastream.
rtmpGroupSettings_adMarkers :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe [RtmpAdMarkers])

-- | Controls the types of data that passes to onCaptionInfo outputs. If
--   set to 'all' then 608 and 708 carried DTVCC data will be passed. If
--   set to 'field1AndField2608' then DTVCC data will be stripped out, but
--   608 data from both fields will be passed. If set to 'field1608' then
--   only the data carried in 608 from field 1 video will be passed.
rtmpGroupSettings_captionData :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe RtmpCaptionData)

-- | Controls behavior when content cache fills up. If remote origin server
--   stalls the RTMP connection and does not accept content fast enough the
--   'Media Cache' will fill up. When the cache reaches the duration
--   specified by cacheLength the cache will stop accepting new content. If
--   set to disconnectImmediately, the RTMP output will force a disconnect.
--   Clear the media cache, and reconnect after restartDelay seconds. If
--   set to waitForServer, the RTMP output will wait up to 5 minutes to
--   allow the origin server to begin accepting data again.
rtmpGroupSettings_cacheFullBehavior :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe RtmpCacheFullBehavior)

-- | Cache length, in seconds, is used to calculate buffer size.
rtmpGroupSettings_cacheLength :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Authentication scheme to use when connecting with CDN
rtmpGroupSettings_authenticationScheme :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe AuthenticationScheme)

-- | Controls the behavior of this RTMP group if input becomes unavailable.
--   - emitOutput: Emit a slate until input returns. - pauseOutput: Stop
--   transmitting data until input returns. This does not close the
--   underlying RTMP connection.
rtmpGroupSettings_inputLossAction :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe InputLossActionForRtmpOut)

-- | If a streaming output fails, number of seconds to wait until a restart
--   is initiated. A value of 0 means never restart.
rtmpGroupSettings_restartDelay :: Lens' RtmpGroupSettings (Maybe Natural)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpGroupSettings.RtmpGroupSettings


module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputCertificateMode

-- | Rtmp Output Certificate Mode
newtype RtmpOutputCertificateMode
RtmpOutputCertificateMode' :: Text -> RtmpOutputCertificateMode
[fromRtmpOutputCertificateMode] :: RtmpOutputCertificateMode -> Text

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings

-- | Rtmp Output Settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newRtmpOutputSettings</a> smart constructor.
data RtmpOutputSettings
RtmpOutputSettings' :: Maybe RtmpOutputCertificateMode -> Maybe Natural -> Maybe Natural -> OutputLocationRef -> RtmpOutputSettings

-- | If set to verifyAuthenticity, verify the tls certificate chain to a
--   trusted Certificate Authority (CA). This will cause rtmps outputs with
--   self-signed certificates to fail.
[$sel:certificateMode:RtmpOutputSettings'] :: RtmpOutputSettings -> Maybe RtmpOutputCertificateMode

-- | Number of retry attempts.
[$sel:numRetries:RtmpOutputSettings'] :: RtmpOutputSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | Number of seconds to wait before retrying a connection to the Flash
--   Media server if the connection is lost.
[$sel:connectionRetryInterval:RtmpOutputSettings'] :: RtmpOutputSettings -> Maybe Natural

-- | The RTMP endpoint excluding the stream name (eg. rtmp://host/appname).
--   For connection to Akamai, a username and password must be supplied.
--   URI fields accept format identifiers.
[$sel:destination:RtmpOutputSettings'] :: RtmpOutputSettings -> OutputLocationRef

-- | Create a value of <a>RtmpOutputSettings</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:certificateMode:RtmpOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpOutputSettings_certificateMode</a> - If set to
--   verifyAuthenticity, verify the tls certificate chain to a trusted
--   Certificate Authority (CA). This will cause rtmps outputs with
--   self-signed certificates to fail.
--   
--   <a>$sel:numRetries:RtmpOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpOutputSettings_numRetries</a> - Number of retry attempts.
--   
--   <a>$sel:connectionRetryInterval:RtmpOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpOutputSettings_connectionRetryInterval</a> - Number of seconds
--   to wait before retrying a connection to the Flash Media server if the
--   connection is lost.
--   
--   <a>$sel:destination:RtmpOutputSettings'</a>,
--   <a>rtmpOutputSettings_destination</a> - The RTMP endpoint excluding
--   the stream name (eg. rtmp://host/appname). For connection to Akamai, a
--   username and password must be supplied. URI fields accept format
--   identifiers.
newRtmpOutputSettings :: OutputLocationRef -> RtmpOutputSettings

-- | If set to verifyAuthenticity, verify the tls certificate chain to a
--   trusted Certificate Authority (CA). This will cause rtmps outputs with
--   self-signed certificates to fail.
rtmpOutputSettings_certificateMode :: Lens' RtmpOutputSettings (Maybe RtmpOutputCertificateMode)

-- | Number of retry attempts.
rtmpOutputSettings_numRetries :: Lens' RtmpOutputSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | Number of seconds to wait before retrying a connection to the Flash
--   Media server if the connection is lost.
rtmpOutputSettings_connectionRetryInterval :: Lens' RtmpOutputSettings (Maybe Natural)

-- | The RTMP endpoint excluding the stream name (eg. rtmp://host/appname).
--   For connection to Akamai, a username and password must be supplied.
--   URI fields accept format identifiers.
rtmpOutputSettings_destination :: Lens' RtmpOutputSettings OutputLocationRef
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.RtmpOutputSettings.RtmpOutputSettings

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.FrameCaptureGroupSettings

-- | Frame Capture Group Settings
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newFrameCaptureGroupSettings</a> smart constructor.
data FrameCaptureGroupSettings
FrameCaptureGroupSettings' :: Maybe FrameCaptureCdnSettings -> OutputLocationRef -> FrameCaptureGroupSettings

-- | Parameters that control interactions with the CDN.
[$sel:frameCaptureCdnSettings:FrameCaptureGroupSettings'] :: FrameCaptureGroupSettings -> Maybe FrameCaptureCdnSettings

-- | The destination for the frame capture files. Either the URI for an
--   Amazon S3 bucket and object, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   s3ssl://sportsDelivery/highlights/20180820/curling-) or the URI for a
--   MediaStore container, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   mediastoressl://sportsDelivery/20180820/curling-). The final file
--   names consist of the prefix from the destination field (for example,
--   "curling-") + name modifier + the counter (5 digits, starting from
--   00001) + extension (which is always .jpg). For example,
--   curling-low.00001.jpg
[$sel:destination:FrameCaptureGroupSettings'] :: FrameCaptureGroupSettings -> OutputLocationRef

-- | Create a value of <a>FrameCaptureGroupSettings</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:frameCaptureCdnSettings:FrameCaptureGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>frameCaptureGroupSettings_frameCaptureCdnSettings</a> - Parameters
--   that control interactions with the CDN.
--   
--   <a>$sel:destination:FrameCaptureGroupSettings'</a>,
--   <a>frameCaptureGroupSettings_destination</a> - The destination for the
--   frame capture files. Either the URI for an Amazon S3 bucket and
--   object, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   s3ssl://sportsDelivery/highlights/20180820/curling-) or the URI for a
--   MediaStore container, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   mediastoressl://sportsDelivery/20180820/curling-). The final file
--   names consist of the prefix from the destination field (for example,
--   "curling-") + name modifier + the counter (5 digits, starting from
--   00001) + extension (which is always .jpg). For example,
--   curling-low.00001.jpg
newFrameCaptureGroupSettings :: OutputLocationRef -> FrameCaptureGroupSettings

-- | Parameters that control interactions with the CDN.
frameCaptureGroupSettings_frameCaptureCdnSettings :: Lens' FrameCaptureGroupSettings (Maybe FrameCaptureCdnSettings)

-- | The destination for the frame capture files. Either the URI for an
--   Amazon S3 bucket and object, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   s3ssl://sportsDelivery/highlights/20180820/curling-) or the URI for a
--   MediaStore container, plus a file name prefix (for example,
--   mediastoressl://sportsDelivery/20180820/curling-). The final file
--   names consist of the prefix from the destination field (for example,
--   "curling-") + name modifier + the counter (5 digits, starting from
--   00001) + extension (which is always .jpg). For example,
--   curling-low.00001.jpg
frameCaptureGroupSettings_destination :: Lens' FrameCaptureGroupSettings OutputLocationRef
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.FrameCaptureGroupSettings.FrameCaptureGroupSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.FrameCaptureGroupSettings.FrameCaptureGroupSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.FrameCaptureGroupSettings.FrameCaptureGroupSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.FrameCaptureGroupSettings.FrameCaptureGroupSettings

module Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Settings to specify when an action should occur. Only one of the
--   options must be selected.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newScheduleActionStartSettings</a> smart constructor.
data ScheduleActionStartSettings
ScheduleActionStartSettings' :: Maybe FollowModeScheduleActionStartSettings -> Maybe ImmediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings -> Maybe FixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings -> ScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Option for specifying an action as relative to another action.
[$sel:followModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'] :: ScheduleActionStartSettings -> Maybe FollowModeScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Option for specifying an action that should be applied immediately.
[$sel:immediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'] :: ScheduleActionStartSettings -> Maybe ImmediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Option for specifying the start time for an action.
[$sel:fixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'] :: ScheduleActionStartSettings -> Maybe FixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Create a value of <a>ScheduleActionStartSettings</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:followModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'</a>,
--   <a>scheduleActionStartSettings_followModeScheduleActionStartSettings</a>
--   - Option for specifying an action as relative to another action.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:immediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'</a>,
--   <a>scheduleActionStartSettings_immediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings</a>
--   - Option for specifying an action that should be applied immediately.
--   
--   
--   <a>$sel:fixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings:ScheduleActionStartSettings'</a>,
--   <a>scheduleActionStartSettings_fixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings</a>
--   - Option for specifying the start time for an action.
newScheduleActionStartSettings :: ScheduleActionStartSettings

-- | Option for specifying an action as relative to another action.
scheduleActionStartSettings_followModeScheduleActionStartSettings :: Lens' ScheduleActionStartSettings (Maybe FollowModeScheduleActionStartSettings)

-- | Option for specifying an action that should be applied immediately.
scheduleActionStartSettings_immediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings :: Lens' ScheduleActionStartSettings (Maybe ImmediateModeScheduleActionStartSettings)

-- | Option for specifying the start time for an action.
scheduleActionStartSettings_fixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings :: Lens' ScheduleActionStartSettings (Maybe FixedModeScheduleActionStartSettings)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.MediaLive.Types.ScheduleActionStartSettings.ScheduleActionStartSettings
